methods.name: W_
javadoc: Return true if an entity can be spawned inside the block (used to get the player's bed spawn location)

methods.name: a
javadoc: Notify block and block below of changes

methods.name: a
javadoc: @deprecated call via {@link IBlockState#getWeakPower(IBlockAccess,BlockPos,EnumFacing)} whenever possible. Implementing/overriding is fine.

methods.name: a
javadoc: Update the provided state given the provided neighbor facing and neighbor state, returning a new state.
For example, fences make their connections to the passed in state if possible, and wet concrete powder immediately returns its solidified counterpart.
Note that this method should ideally consider only the specific face passed in.

methods.name: b
javadoc: @deprecated call via {@link IBlockState#getStrongPower(IBlockAccess,BlockPos,EnumFacing)} whenever possible. Implementing/overriding is fine.

methods.name: d
javadoc: @deprecated call via {@link IBlockState#getMobilityFlag()} whenever possible. Implementing/overriding is fine.

methods.name: f_
javadoc: Can this block provide power. Only wire currently seems to have this change based on its state.
@deprecated call via {@link IBlockState#canProvidePower()} whenever possible. Implementing/overriding is fine.
